Join us

This is the perfect event to find out about Civic Projects you can volunteer for or promote. We will have some non CodeForKC projects, and there will be some new projects pitching. This was a Great event last year since teams did more than just reporting back, it allows them to recruit new members and networking with other projects.

Sprint Accelerator
210 W 19 Terrace
Kansas City, MO 64108

 

SIGN UP
 

What is Code for KC Report Out and Recruitment?

A place for people to find a project to volunteer on. If you can define and design, make apps look good, make things easy to use, manage projects, spread the word, measure and trak, build and manage a community, then we are looking for you!
